page.title: 16Housing in Malhamdale
page.content:
There are no housing estates as such in Malhamdale,although new houses are being built,especially in Airton.Many new developments tend to be barn conversions.Most houses are owned by their inhabitants,though some farms and farmhouses are leased. In Airton there are 2 "alms" houses for the elderly poor of the dale.
Media in Malhamdale The "Craven Herald",a local paper that contains any news from the block is published 10 miles away in Skipton.A newspaper published by the National Parks Committee called "The Visitor" is widely circulated around the area. A parish magazine is also widely circulated.A travelling library visits the area once a week.
